Package com.nxp.eseclient

Class LoaderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nxp.eseclient.LoaderService

  • public final class LoaderService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the primary API for managing Applet load applet.

    • Method Detail

      • createLSInterface

        public static LoaderService createLSInterface​()
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              android.os.RemoteException
        Helper to create an Loader Service object.
        Returns:
        the LoaderService, or null if no LoaderService exists
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        android.os.RemoteException

      • appletLoadApplet

        public int appletLoadApplet​(java.lang.String pkg,
                            java.lang.String choice)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This API performs Applet load Applet operation it fetches the secure script from the path choice and string pkg is used for SHA verification of callers context's package name by ALA applet.
        Parameters:
        pkg - Callers package name
        choice - Secure script path
        Returns:
        int :- SUCCESS returns 0 or Not Supported returns 0x0F otherwise non-zero.

        Requires Manifest.permission.NFC permission.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a failure occurred during appletLoadApplet

      • getListofApplets

        public int getListofApplets​(java.lang.String pkg,
                            java.lang.String[] name)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This API lists all the applets loaded through ALA module.
        Parameters:
        pkg - Callers package name
        name - List of all applet
        Returns:
        int :- SUCCESS returns 0 or Not Supported returns FF otherwise non-zero.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a failure occurred during getListofApplets

      • getKeyCertificate

        public byte[] getKeyCertificate​()
                         throws java.io.IOException
        This API returns the certificate key of the ALA applet present
        Returns:
        byte[] :- Returns certificate key byte array.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a failure occurred during getKeyCertificate

      • lsExecuteScript

        public byte[] lsExecuteScript​(java.lang.String srcIn,
                              java.lang.String rspOut)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        This API triggers the execution of Loader service secure script and store the responses in the given rspout file path.
        Parameters:
        srcIn - Loader service secure input script filepath
        rspOut - Response ouput filepath where executed commands response are stored
        Returns:
        byte[] :- Contains the last executed LS commands response status word
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException - If a failure occurred during Loader service operation
        java.io.IOException - If unable to perform Loader service operation

      • lsGetVersion

        public byte[] lsGetVersion​()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This API returns the Loader service client and applet version
        Returns:
        byte[] :- Contains the LS client's and applet's major,minor version respectively 0,1 index contain client's major,minor version and 2,3 index contain applet's major,minor version
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException - If a failure occurred during get version operation
        java.io.IOException - If unable to perform get version operation
